bug.short_desc: qx.bom.element.AnimationHandle does not report properly the state

long_desc.thetext:
Overview: Calling isEnded() and isPlaying() in a qx.bom.elementAnimationHandle object when the animation is over, doesn't report properly the state of the animation.
Steps to Reproduce: Look at this playground example: http://tinyurl.com/oblnlot Open the log. Press the button and let the animation finish. **After the animation is over** hoover the mouse cursor over the button. Observe the log.
Actual Results: Every time the cursor enters the button in the log is printed: _animation.isEnded(): false _animation.isPlaying(): true
Expected Results: Every time the cursor enters the button in the log is printed: _animation.isEnded(): true _animation.isPlaying(): false
